class="preordered-label">已預購</span> </span> <span class="preview-overlay-container" data-docid="com.gombosdev.ampere">  </span>  </a>  </div> <div class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gombosdev.ampere" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gombosdev.ampere" title="Ampere"> 510.    Ampere  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Braintrapp" title="Braintrapp">Braintrapp</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.gombosdev.ampere"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5nb21ib3NkZXYuYW1wZXJlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Did you ever felt, that one Charger/USB cable set charges your device really fast and the other not? Now, you can prove this with Ampere.<p>Measure the charging and discharging current of your battery.</p><p>The app works on Android 4.0.3+ devices. Not every device is supported because there are devices which lacks an appropriate measurement chip (or the interface) and they can not be supported at all. Please read the list of not supported phones at the end of the description.</p><p>The app is not meant to be mA accurate. It is only good for evaluate which Charger/USB cable combo is working the best for you on the same device.</p><p>Start the app and wait ca. 10 seconds ("measuring" is on the display). After this time, the charging or discharging current will be shown.</p><p>The current depends on many things:<br>- Charger (USB/AC/Wireless)<br>- USB cable<br>- Phone type<br>- Current tasks running<br>- Display brightness<br>- WiFi state<br>- GPS state</p><p>Please don't use the readings on this app as concrete science. However, the readings are good enough to relatively measure how various chargers and USB cables fair on the same device.</p><p>If your Lollipop device (or later) shows 0 all the time, please use the settings option "Old measurement method". You can force the app with it to use the old measurement interface, if the Lollipop device has at least one.</p><p>Unfortunately some Samsung devices don't give correct (measured) values (e.g.: S5), just the maximum possible charging current with the actual USB cable/charger configuration. This is a firmware problem.</p><p>About notification and background measurement:<br>- The measurement works in the background only if you switch on the notification in the settings.<br>- You can hide the notification icon by setting the notification priority to minimum.</p><p>----</p><p>Background info: The app measures the charging/discharging current of the battery. If your phone is not connected to a charger, you see the discharging current which is negative. If you connect a charger then the current what the charger gives will be used to supply your phone and the remaining power will be charged into the battery.</p><p>If your phone consumes 300 mA without a charger connected (-300mA on the display), then a 500 mA charger will charge your battery maximum with 200 mA current (200mA on display).</p><p>----</p><p>Technical info: The displayed current is an average value from 50 measurements minus the 10 upper values and the 10 lower values. The displayed current can be shaky or unstable or even just zero which means, that the Android system provides such unstable values. Every company uses different battery types and other hardware making it difficult to get accurate results about your charger.</p><p>----</p><p>LiPo batteries don't draw the maximum for the full time it takes to charge the phone. If your battery is charged almost full then the charging current will be much less as by lower battery levels.</p><p>- A graph explaining LiPo charge stages: http://batteryuniversity.com/_img/content/ion1.jpg<br>- Dave's (EEVBlog) LiPo Charging Tutorial: http://youtu.be/A6mKd5_-abk</p><p>----</p><p>Phones/ROMS compatible only with "Old measurement method" switched on and selected the right "Measurement interface":<br>➤ HTC One M7 / M8</p><p>Phones/ROMS reported to be not working with this app:<br>➤ Galaxy Grand Prime - fortuna3gdtv<br>➤ Galaxy Note2 - t03g, t03gchn, t03gchnduos, t03gcmcc, t03gctc, t03gcuduos<br>➤ Galaxy S3 - d2att, d2spr, d2vmu<br>➤ Galaxy Tab4 7.0 - degas3g<br>➤ HTC Desire 510 - htc_a11ul8x26<br>➤ HTC One S (ville), X (endeavoru), XL (evita)<br>➤ HTC Sensation 4G - pyramid</p><p>Please do not give wrong rating, if your phone is one of the above. Not the app is wrong, but your phone does not support this kind of measurement yet.</p><p>If the app doesn't work on your device with pre-Lollipop Android version, then please read the first and the second posts in this XDA developer forum thread: http://goo.gl/pZqJg8 . Please post your problem with screenshots in the XDA thread.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gombosdev.ampere" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gombosdev.ampere" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.4 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 87.5826358795166%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag Amazon Kindle  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Amazon+Mobile+LLC" title="Amazon Mobile LLC">Amazon Mobile LLC</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.amazon.kindle"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button style="display:none" class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGwoZEhcKEWNvbS5hbWF6b24ua2luZGxlEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>   <span class="acquired-label"> <span class="acquired-icon"></span> </span> </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The Kindle app puts over a million books at your fingertips.  It’s the app for every reader, whether you’re a book reader, magazine reader, or newspaper reader—and you don’t need to own a Kindle to use it.  Choose from over a million Kindle books from the Kindle Store or enjoy popular magazines like The Economist and Reader’s Digest with high-resolution color images.*<p>• Read Free Books—Choose from thousands of free ebooks such as Pride &amp; Prejudice or The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes.</p><p>• Shop for Books—Easily shop for ebooks, including new releases and New York Times Best Sellers.</p><p>• Use the Built-In Dictionary, Google, and Wikipedia—The Kindle app has a built-in dictionary that allows you to look up words instantly while you’re reading your ebooks.  Simply tap and hold a word to view its definition or use the Google and Wikipedia links to get more information.</p><p>• Sync Your eBooks—The Kindle app lets you read the same book across devices and automatically syncs where you left off so you can start reading on one device and pick up where you left off on another device.  The app syncs your furthest page read, bookmarks, notes, and highlights between Android, PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone, iPod touch, BlackBerry, Windows Phone 8, and any of our Kindle devices using our Whispersync technology. </p><p>• Sample Books Before You Buy—Read the first chapter of a book for free before you decide to buy.</p><p>• Customize Your Reading—Choose your preferred font size, screen brightness, background color, and orientation (portrait or landscape) to read your books.</p><p>• Borrow eBooks from the Library—Check out ebooks from your local library and have them delivered wirelessly to your Kindle app.</p><p>• Read print replica textbooks on Android tablets.  Print Replica Kindle books maintain the rich formatting and layout of their related print editions and provide features to help students study smarter including ability to highlight passages, add margin notes, and search for keywords.  Whispersync technology saves and synchronizes your bookmarks, notes, and highlights across your devices.</p><p>* Selection for U.S. users only; selection and price of ebooks and e-periodicals vary by country.</p><p><br>About app permissions<br>• https://amazon.com/help/kindleforandroid/permissions</p><p>Support<br>• http://amazon.com/help/kindle<br>• <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=BestRingtonesApps" title="BestRingtonesApps">BestRingtonesApps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  一个好的笑声是房子里的一缕阳光！搞笑短信铃声和声音应用程序让您一天中最美好的事物之一。<p></p><p>您不需要每天听笑话来保持一个好心情。像搞笑短信提示音如此小的事情可以让您的一天充满很多乐趣，这是多么的惊人。搞笑短信铃声和声音是一个将带有精心挑选的奇怪的声音设置为短信音的应用程序。在这个搞笑的声卡中，您可以找到令人捧腹的动物的声音，有趣的歌声，孩子们的声音和其他疯狂的事情来设置作为短信铃声。</p><p><br>很酷的功能</p><p><br>- 设置为短信铃声<br>- 设置虚假信息的定时器<br>-在您的手机主屏幕上设置最喜爱的声音的小部件按钮</p><p></p><p>笑是对某些刺激的反应。它可能会由听到一个笑话，发痒，或受到其他刺激时发生。它通常被认为是一些积极的情绪状态，如喜悦，欢乐，幸福，轻松等的一种视觉表达。然而，在某些情况下，它可能表达其他的情绪，比如尴尬，道歉或困惑（“紧张不安的笑声“）或处于礼节的笑声。</p><p><br>笑声不仅为您的肌肉提供了一个全面的锻炼，并且它可以释放大量缓解压力的内啡呔。另外，您的身体不能区分真假的笑声 –任何傻笑都能做到。</p><p></p><p><br>我们在日常生活中需要经常微笑，并且通过笑来缓解压力。笑是人类应对和生存的礼物。每次我们笑的时候，笑的力量都会被释放出来。在当今具有压力的世界中，我们更需要笑声。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span 12/24 hour clock<br>* Color choice on some info displayed<br>* System Stats Information pop-up<br>* Battery icon on clock<br>* Week number in the hours tab, as an option<br>* for scheduling outdoor screen<br> tap bottom left-&gt;Launch system information window<br> tap on weather icon-&gt;Launch weather forecast screen<br> tap Hour-&gt;launch anything!(set your own preference from configuration screen)<br> tap Min -&gt;launch anything!(set your own preference from configuration screen)</p><p>Widgets on Android work a bit differently than a normal application. Unlike regular programs they don't just install themselves in the application tray so you have to add them manually. They will not open or launch.<br>Here's how to add a widget on your Android home screen.</p><p>STEPS HOW TO ADD A WIDGET<br>==========================<br>1.On your Android home screen, tap any blank or “empty” area with size 4x2 and hold down your finger. <br>2.An “Add to Home screen” window will pop up. From that window, tap “Widgets”. <br>3.You’ll be presented with a list of all the installed Widgets on your Android device. <br>4.Select the "3D Digital Weather Clock” to add to your home screen by tapping it.</p><p>Notes<br>=====<br>"Time frozen/not updating"-&gt; taskiller killed the clock(exclude it from taskillers)<br>When phone starts, clock starts in less than a min too.</p><p>ROM users-&gt; make sure the clock is NOT moved on SD card.<br>Widgets are not supposed to be on SD card. Move it back to the phone storage.</p><p>Weather hint: For world destinations with two words in the name, type in the box the words with a plus sign.<br>For example "Buenos Aires" type "Buenos+Aires",remember the "+" sign -no spaces, don't include the quotes.</p><p>Email problems/suggestions<br>Check our website for more help.</p><p>EXCLUDE IT FROM TASKILLERS!!!<br>Be polite, this App。<p>別再為壞天氣措手不及！在主屏幕上将实时天气情况设置为华丽的动画壁纸，关注即将来到的任何天气。在主螢幕上將即時天氣情況設置為華麗的動畫壁紙，關注即將來到的任何天氣。無論是陰天、雨天、下雪天，甚至是狂風暴雨，即時天氣都能提供目前位置與世界各地的的天氣及預報。</p><p>從今以後，不必再為了知道天氣如何探頭看窗外了！不論是哪種天氣，即時天氣都能生動地呈現在螢幕上！即時天氣™採用了創新的技術，將帶給您身歷其境般的全新體驗！</p><p>• href="/store/apps/developer?id=AIO+Toolbox+Inc." title="AIO Toolbox Inc.">AIO Toolbox Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag class="description">  電池優化衛士 – 優化電池性能&amp;延長電池使用壽命 <p>電池優化衛士是一款專門為安卓手機和平板開發的電池優化工具。它集合了各種電池管理和優化功能，提供精確的電池資訊，並記錄電池使用歷史、監測耗電程式的運行，説明你解決在設備使用過程中遇到的各種電池問題。</p><p>軟體功能：<br>- 即時記錄電池資訊<br>電池優化衛士即時記錄各種電池資訊，包括電池電量、溫度等並預測剩餘電量使用時間。</p><p>- 省電模式優化電池使用狀態<br>電池優化衛士提供了四種預設省電模式，不管你的設備使用習慣如何，四種模式都能有效的減緩耗電情況，延長電池壽命。除此以外，有特殊省電需求的使用者還可以添加個性化模式來優化省電效果。</p><p>- 曲線圖記錄電池電量/溫度/電壓變化<br>電池優化衛士以曲線圖形式記錄最近三天的電池電量變化、溫度變化以及電壓變化走勢。 你還可以通過這些資料找出最適合自己的省電模式。</p><p>- 監測正在運行的程式的耗電情況<br>電池優化衛士跟蹤並記錄每一款正在運行的程式的耗電情況，並以百分比形式展示出其耗電比例。通過這些資訊，你可以輕鬆找出設備中的耗電進程，並將其終止運行或者卸載。</p><p>- 快速設置和桌面Widget<br>通過電池優化衛士桌面Widget，你還可以輕鬆管理手機上的日常使用元素，包括WiFi（Wlan），藍牙，GPS，移動資料，飛行模式，螢幕超時，螢幕亮度，觸感回饋等等。</p><p>- 任務管理器優化省電效果<br>電池優化衛士還通過終止幕後程式來優化省電效果。對於不想被終止的幕後程式，你可通過設置-白名單來保護。安裝高級工作管理員軟體（記憶體加速器）的話，電池優化衛士會運行得更好，省電效果更佳！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.a0soft.gphone.aDataOnOff" title="省電超人 (2 Battery)"> 536.    省電超人 (2 Battery)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Sam+Lu" title="Sam Lu">Sam Lu</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.a0soft.gphone.aDataOnOff"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJgokEiIKHGNvbS5hMHNvZnQuZ3Bob25lLmFEYXRhT25PZmYQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  你是否有手機電力總無法撐過一天的困惱？依使用者實際使用結果，2 Battery (省電超人) 可以幫你延長多達70%的使用時間。<p>*** 已超過 10,000,000 使用者，並證明有效 ***</p><p>為什麼會這麼神奇？因為這個應用會在你關閉螢幕後，靠著定期幫你開關網路連線，來達到延長電池使用時間的目的。並利用我們獨特的技術，仍保持其他應用資料的同步。</p><p>您不需要再手動開關網路。使用這個應用，不僅可以節省電力的消耗，延長你的使用時間，也可降低你的手機上網費用。</p><p>1. 當螢幕關掉時自動開關網路(3G/4G/WiFi)連線<br>2. 上方狀態列上顯示電池剩餘電量與最近使用資訊<br>3. 安裝後即可使用，使用4小時候即見省電效果</p><p>Toggling mobile data does not work on Android 5 unless you use a rooted device. We can still help to toggle Wi-Fi or use screen filter for saving the battery.</p><p>特色<br>★ 螢幕關閉時，自動定期開關網路，以減少電力之使用與節省數據的使用費用<br>★ 螢幕開啟後，馬上啟用網路，並維持網路的連線，直到關閉螢幕為止<br>★ 可設定當螢幕解鎖時，不要立即啟用行動網路連線<br>★ 支援夜間模式功能 (PRO-only)<br>★ 無廣告 (PRO-only)<br>★ 支援黑、白名單功能<br>★ 當你將手機放入口袋或面朝下放在桌上時，可設定是否要自動關閉螢幕<br>★ 內建螢幕遮光片功能，可更進一步降低螢幕亮度及節省電力<br>★ 當電池充飽或電量不足時，可設定是否發出通知<br>★ 可以自行設定網路的定期開啟週期<br>★ 可設定當充電時是否要保持網路的連線<br>★ 可設定在當鎖定或解除螢幕鎖定時，發出提醒音效<br>★ 提供不同電池圖示風格<br>★ 支援桌面小工具<br>★ 提供並顯示各式電池使用資訊，包含剩餘電力、已使用的電力、距上次充電的使用時間、預估電力即將耗盡時間、電池健康狀態、電壓，溫度等等</p><p>DashClock Extension<br>★ requires DashClock Widget by Roman Nurik<br>★ estimated battery run out time<br>★ detailed battery information<br>★ battery icon theme (battery icon &amp; level, battery level)</p><p>Sony SmartWatch 2<br>★ 當手機電力不足時，會透過手錶發出警訊<br>★ 小工具，應用模式都會顯示手機電力資訊<br>★ 支援低耗電模式<br>★ Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2</p><p>Sony SmartWatch 1<br>★ 當手機電力不足時，會透過手錶發出警訊<br>★ 小工具，應用模式都會顯示手機電力資訊<br>★ LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch</p><p>評論文章或影片<br>✔ http://goo.gl/ge7fLN (挨踢路人甲)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/MfKas (重灌狂人)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/BxIQn (電腦王阿達)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/KWCmDc (video)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/vOMFX (video)<br>✔ http://goo.gl/VlZGQ<br>✔ http://goo.gl/qAdkI</p><p>注意事項<br>★ 解除安裝前請先卸載 "自動關閉螢幕" 設備管理員<br>★ 當行動網路被關掉時，只表示手機的上網功能被暫時關閉。打電話，傳簡訊等功能，都不會受到影響。</p><p>不滿意保證退費<br>Google 的 15 分鐘試用時間對這類軟體來說顯然太短了，您可以試用 PRO 版 24 You'll know exactly what needs to get done, who's going to do it, and what's coming up next. Plus, everything you do is synced and saved instantly to the cloud, so that all your devices are always up to date.</p><p>With Trello, you can create boards to organize anything you're working on. Use them solo, or invite colleagues, friends, and family to work together.</p><p>Write your ideas down on Trello cards and arrange them in lists on your boards. Add details to your cards such as:</p><p>• checklists to keep track of to-dos<br>• comments to update your co-workers<br>• photos and videos<br>• who's working on that card</p><p>With the Trello app in your pocket, you can make to-do lists waiting in line at the grocery store, assign tasks to your co-worker while you're on the train home, or upload a photo of that paisley couch you saw the store that's just perfect for the house you're furnishing.</p><p>Trello is great with Wear! <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaFgoUEhIKDGNvbS5qZWUuY2FsYxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span 袖珍計算器的功能並增加了一些數學運算器<br>- 任何時間可記載上次的計算狀態和覆查計算歷史記錄<br>- 可以輸入最多15位數，並可運算所有的數字。<br>- 上使用這個計算機 (G Watch, Gear Live, Moto 360, ...)</p><p>√ 貨幣兌換<br>- 提供實時貨幣匯率<br>- 出國前只需更新，匯率更新後，你可以離線使用貨幣轉換器。<br>- 直接顯示貨幣名稱,代碼和國家名稱和國旗圖像。</p><p>√ 利息計算器<br>- 提供各種選項用於計算利息：零存整取儲蓄、定期儲蓄、簡單利息、複利息等等。<br>- 增強的混合計算功能。 可用混合計算月度、季度、半年度和年度。<br>- 如果你想知道五年內累積壹億元，嘗試這套未來的價值功能.</p><p>√ 週年紀念日計算器<br>- 一張照片可記載週年紀念日<br>- 提供各種日期計算<br>- 日或日計數檢視</p><p>√ 折扣計算器<br>- 計算折扣價格 / 折扣%<br>- 額外的折扣計算</p><p>√ 貸款計算器<br>- 支持平均支付 / 固定本金付款額 / 氣球式付款<br>- 只設利率周期<br>- 計算任何類型的貸款，如抵押貸款、汽車貸款。</p><p>√ 單位換算器<br>- 支持長度、面積、重量、體積、溫度、時間、速度、壓力、力、功、角度、數據和燃料</p><p>√ 健康計算器<br>- 使用健康計算機讓你保持健康的身體<br>- 同一個畫面即可計算出理想的體重,BMI(體重指數)和BFP(體脂肪率) <br>- 隨時可在公制和英制系統之間切換</p><p>√ 小費計算器<br>- 計算小費並平分帳單<br>- 銷售稅和小費可分開計算</p><p>√ 增值稅計算器<br>- 快速且容易的計算增值稅</p><p>√ 經濟耗油計算器<br>- 以里程,容量和油價，可預期計算出最經濟的耗油</p><p>購買高級版本,可除去廣告和支持我們開發更優質的應用程式.</p><p>*如果您在應用程式中遇到任何問題或用詞不正確，請與我們聯繫 :<br>  - https://www.facebook.com/MultiCalculator<br>  -
